tutors.name: Matthew Couture
tutors.title: B.S. in Applied Mathematics & Physics
tutors.bio: Former Division III track athlete with PhD in Applied Mathematics. Specializes in STEM subjects for student athletes. Dr. Chen understands the demanding schedule of competitive athletics and has developed unique teaching methods that work around training schedules.

testimonials.quote: Matt helped me master calculus while training 6 hours a day. His flexible scheduling saved my GPA!

tutors.name: Prof. Sarah Williams
tutors.title: English Literature Professor
tutors.bio: Former college volleyball player, now English Professor. Expert in helping athletes develop strong writing and communication skills. Prof. Williams has a special talent for making literature relevant to student athletes' experiences.
education: BA English - University of North Carolina

testimonials.quote: Professor Williams turned me from hating writing to loving it. My college essays got me into my dream school!

tutors.name: Dr. James Rodriguez
tutors.title: MD, Internal Medicine
tutors.bio: Former soccer player turned physician. Guides pre-med student athletes through challenging science coursework. Dr. Rodriguez provides invaluable insight into balancing athletic and pre-medical requirements.
education: BS Biology - University of California, Los Angeles

testimonials.quote: Dr. Rodriguez helped me ace organic chemistry while competing nationally. He made complex concepts so clear!

tutors.name: Ms. Emily Foster
tutors.title: MS Psychology
tutors.bio: Former swimming champion with Master's in Psychology. Specializes in helping athletes understand human behavior and historical contexts. Ms. Foster excels at connecting historical events to modern athletic and social issues.

testimonials.quote: Ms. Foster made history come alive! Her sports psychology insights helped both my academics and my performance.

tutors.name: Prof. David Thompson
tutors.title: PhD Economics
tutors.bio: Former baseball player with expertise in economics and business. Specializes in sports economics and helps student athletes understand the business side of sports while mastering complex economic concepts.

testimonials.quote: Professor Thompson taught me economics through sports examples. Now I understand both the game and the business!

tutors.name: Dr. Priya Patel
tutors.title: PhD Computer Science
tutors.bio: Former track and field athlete turned tech expert. Specializes in computer science and data analytics, with a focus on sports technology applications. Dr. Patel helps student athletes see the intersection of technology and athletics.
tutors.athletic_background: Division I Track & Field (Long Jump, Heptathlon)

testimonials.quote: Dr. Patel made coding fun by showing me how to analyze my game stats. Now I love both programming and data!
